title: Spa, Easy Access to Highways 101, 280 & 87, Fitness Center
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 712 Sq.
With lush courtyards and Mediterranean-inspired architecture, San Marino offers a comfortable ambiance rarely found in the busy, urban communities of San Jose.
You won’t find a more conveniently located, pet-friendly community that provides easy access to everything San Jose has to offer without the noisy hustle and bustle of a crowded city complex.
If you are looking for a home with a spacious layout and top-of-the-line amenities, then our apartments in San Jose for rent are the ideal place for you!
Give us a call and schedule your tour.
Our leasing team is ready to assist you with your transition to your new home at San Marino.
